Tools
  • Hot glue gun

lines.text: Half size bread board (can get from amazon, maker shed, and raidioshack)
lines.text_raw: Half size bread board (can get from amazon, maker shed, and raidioshack)

lines.text: various wanted components, LEDs, resistors, capacitors, etc.
lines.text_raw: various wanted components, LEDs, resistors, capacitors, etc.

lines.text: Take one of the power rails off the bread board and stick it on the inside of the lid of the breadboard.
lines.text_raw: Take one of the power rails off the bread board and stick it on the inside of the lid of the breadboard.

lines.text: hot glue the battery pack in the center on the inside.
lines.text_raw: hot glue the battery pack in the center on the inside.

lines.text: Put the positive and negative leads from the battery pack in the remaining power rail and put just enough hot glue to hold them in. ( this is so they don't touch and short out the battery.)
lines.text_raw: Put the positive and negative leads from the battery pack in the remaining power rail and put just enough hot glue to hold them in. ( this is so they don't touch and short out the battery.)

lines.text: Now just add what ever components to the two spaces in the bottom.
